item.title: How to install a package AUR in Arch Linux (the manual way)
item.description: Go to https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/ Copy the line the aur package. Open up you linux terminal. (ex: Xterm, gnome-terminal) Input that address you copied in Step 2 into terminal. Change to package directory. Make package and install in one step. (type root password when prompted) Go up a directory and remove package build directory to clean up.
